title: sold sold sold...nothing to see here folks
author: z28jd

posts.post_title: sold sold sold...nothing to see here folks

posts.post_content: Sold pending payment. I'll have more up in a few days and I'll recycle this thread for them. Go green

Might as well move the beaters cheap too since I'm going to the post office manana.  $30 takes them all, Ewing at least has a decent 649 back, even if his face left the party. No idea how this happened, but my scanner made 8 different files of two scans on it's own. The Ewing has a full name on the bottom(you can see the back has no problems on the bottom) unlike the scan and the top goes a little higher on the 649 back, otherwise excellent job scanner!
How about nine beaters for $60!  Four Polar Bear backs!
Trying to get rid of all the low end stuff at once. If no one buys within a few hours, I'll add more until they finally go. I have over 700 t206s here so I can do this all day :)

Okay, these three as well make 12 cards, all for the low price of $80! 6.67 per card!  I'm just trying to make my trip to the post office tomorrow worthwhile, while also making a low-grade t206 collector happy. The Burch card even has a SC image on the front, how can you beat that! :)
